data.message: i don't want a duplicate account. i want my account unblocked and  back. why don't you answer FB? WHY?

replies.message: Hi there. Here are possible reasons why your account may have been disabled: http://bit.ly/2duyd6J. If you believe that your account was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal. Thanks. -Rey
Facebook I have been attempting to contact you for months now. Please respond.

Facebook, Rey,  when i fill in the account disabled form it says I'm not disabled. i am blocked. i will correct my date of birth if that's the problem. i admit it, I'm 64 not 104. i can't get to it to do that. i sent ID.

Facebook, Rey,  when i fill in the account disabled form it says I'm not disabled. i am blocked. i will correct my date of birth if that's the problem. i admit it, I'm 64 not 104. i can't get to it to do that. i sent ID. i really need help. i very much miss my 9+ years of memories. never thought something like this would happen.

fb ...Please help me.. Do not ignore me. can see I send the message for you? 
https://youtu.be/3aAYUWBwsuE
